item.title: Constructing Life Tables with R
item.description: I have been using the package dplyr to handle with data for a while, and I thought I can use it with ease until I was stuck with my homework on contructing a life table. I found spreadsheets (either Excel or Google Spreadsheets) easy for handling this task, but had a hard time dealing with it in R. I think it was due to my unfamiliarity with the built-in functions and insufficient practice in R.
